webinars.headline: Realtime JavaScript: Getting Started with PubNub
webinars.copy: Learn about PubNub’s realtime features through a step-by-step tutorial on building a full featured JavaScript chat app with messages, typing status, scrollback, and more.
webinars.preheader: Join us tomorrow for a live webinar showing how to build a full-featured chat app with PubNub's Realtime Data Stream Network and JavaScript SDK.

webinars.headline: ES6: Five Features of the New JavaScript You Can Use Right Now
webinars.copy:
ECMAScript 6, or ES6, is the newest version of JavaScript, full of great new features that can make your code fast, more powerful, and easier to understand. Unfortunately, there are so many changes at different stages of development it can be hard to know what to focus on.

In this session, you’ll learn about five specific features of ES6 that you can use right now and will provide immediate benefits to your JavaScript code.
webinars.preheader: In this session we'll show the five new ES6 features you can use right now, that will provide immediate benefit to your application, and how to use them in PubNub BLOCKS.

webinars.headline: Introduction to PubNub BLOCKS
webinars.copy:
Come learn about the most exciting product PubNub has ever launched: PubNub BLOCKS. BLOCKS make modern, realtime apps easy to create without the complexity of scaling your own servers.

In this session PubNub experts will walk you through how BLOCKS work, explain the concepts they employ, and give you a taste of the thousands of problems they can solve.
webinars.preheader: Join us tomorrow to learn about PubNub BLOCKS, the most exciting product PubNub has ever launched. BLOCKS make modern, realtime apps easy to create without the complexity of scaling your own servers.
